unnormalised: SpeedX Courier announced today that packages addressed to "Flat No. 12A, Sai Apartments, Andheri (W), Mumbai, 400058" experienced a 15% delay last month due to incomplete address formats. According to their internal analysis, common errors included missing the building name, incorrect flat numbers, and forgetting the locality abbreviation "(W)" for West. This impacts overall delivery efficiency in the densely populated areas of Mumbai.
normalised: SpeedX Courier announced today that packages addressed to "Flat Number twelve A, Sai Apartments, Andheri (W), Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty eight" experienced a fifteen percent delay last month due to incomplete address formats. According to their internal analysis, common errors included missing the building name, incorrect flat numbers, and forgetting the locality abbreviation "(W)" for West. This impacts overall delivery efficiency in the densely populated areas of Mumbai.

unnormalised: The company urges customers to provide complete addresses, including landmark details where possible, to ensure timely delivery. For example, instead of writing just "MG Road, Bangalore," a more accurate address would be "No. 78, 2nd Floor, above State Bank of India, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001." Adding a phone number can further help delivery personnel in case of difficulty in locating the address.
normalised: The company urges customers to provide complete addresses, including landmark details where possible, to ensure timely delivery. For example, instead of writing just "M G Road, Bangalore," a more accurate address would be "Number seventy eight, second Floor, above State Bank of India, M G Road, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and one." Adding a phone number can further help delivery personnel in case of difficulty in locating the address.

unnormalised: SpeedX Courier is collaborating with local municipalities to update address databases and improve address recognition algorithms. They have also launched an educational campaign to promote accurate address formatting, emphasizing the importance of including details like "Opp. City Centre Mall" or "Near XYZ Hospital" whenever feasible. This collaborative effort aims to reduce delivery delays and enhance customer satisfaction.
normalised: SpeedX Courier is collaborating with local municipalities to update address databases and improve address recognition algorithms. They have also launched an educational campaign to promote accurate address formatting, emphasizing the importance of including details like "Opposite City Centre Mall" or "Near X Y Z Hospital" whenever feasible. This collaborative effort aims to reduce delivery delays and enhance customer satisfaction.
